com.teaminternational.coe.utils.webdriver

Class ByJquery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openqa.selenium.By
      • com.teaminternational.coe.utils.webdriver.ByJquery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ByJquery
extends org.openqa.selenium.By
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class extends selenium class By and implements method that allow retrieve WebElements by jQuery selector. Method checks if jQuery added on the page and if jQuery wasn't found it adds jQuery to the page
    Version:
    1.0 01/10/18
    Author:
    Vladyslav.Yegorov@teaminternational.com
    See Also:
    By, Serialized Form
